verses.verse: וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> happened בְּבֹ֨א <WH935> were come דָוִ֧ד <WH1732> And it came to pass when David וַאֲנָשָׁ֛יו <WH376> and his men צִֽקְלַ֖ג <WH6860> to Ziklag בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <WH7992> on the third וַעֲמָלֵקִ֣י <WH6003> that the Amalekites פָֽשְׁט֗וּ <WH6584> had invaded אֶל־ <WH413> on נֶ֙גֶב֙ <WH5045> the south וְאֶל־ <WH413> and on צִ֣קְלַ֔ג <WH6860> and Ziklag וַיַּכּוּ֙ <WH5221> and smitten אֶת־ <WH853> צִ֣קְלַ֔ג <WH6860> Ziklag וַיִּשְׂרְפ֥וּ <WH8313> and burned אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> it with fire

וַיִּשְׁבּ֨וּ <WH7617> captives אֶת־ <WH853> הַנָּשִׁ֤ים <WH802> And had taken the women אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּהּ֙ מִקָּטֹ֣ן <WH6996> or small וְעַד־ <WH5704> against גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> either great לֹ֥א <WH3808> without הֵמִ֖יתוּ <WH4191> that [were] therein they slew אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> not any וַיִּֽנְהֲג֔וּ <WH5090> but carried [them] away וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> and went לְדַרְכָּֽם׃ <WH1870> on their way

וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> came דָוִ֤ד <WH1732> So David וַֽאֲנָשָׁיו֙ <WH376> and his men אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> to the city וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold שְׂרוּפָ֖ה <WH8313> and behold [it was] burned בָּאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> with fire וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֛ם <WH802> and their wives וּבְנֵיהֶ֥ם <WH1121> and their sons וּבְנֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1323> and their daughters נִשְׁבּֽוּ׃ <WH7617> were taken captives

וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> that [were] with him lifted up דָוִ֜ד <WH1732> Then David וְהָעָ֧ם <WH5971> and the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who אִתּ֛וֹ <WH854> for אֶת־ <WH853> קוֹלָ֖ם <WH6963> their voice וַיִּבְכּ֑וּ <WH1058> and wept עַ֣ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> who אֵין־ <WH369> there בָּהֶ֛ם כֹּ֖חַ <WH3581> until they had no more power לִבְכּֽוֹת׃ <WH1058> to weep

וּשְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> two נְשֵֽׁי־ <WH802> wives דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> And David's נִשְׁבּ֑וּ <WH7617> were taken captives אֲחִינֹ֙עַם֙ <WH293> Ahinoam הַיִּזְרְעֵלִ֔ית <WH3159> the Jezreelitess וַאֲבִיגַ֕יִל <WH26> and Abigail אֵ֖שֶׁת <WH802> the wife נָבָ֥ל <WH5037> of Nabal הַֽכַּרְמְלִֽי׃ <WH3761> the Carmelite

וַתֵּ֨צֶר <WH3334> distressed לְדָוִ֜ד <WH1732> And David מְאֹ֗ד <WH3966> was greatly כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because אָמְר֤וּ <WH559> spake הָעָם֙ <WH5971> for the people לְסָקְל֔וֹ <WH5619> of stoning כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because מָ֙רָה֙ <WH4784> bitter נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> him because the soul כָּל־ <WH3605> for all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of all the people אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every man עַל־ <WH5921> because [בְּנֹו כ] (בָּנָ֣יו <WH1121> afflicted ק) וְעַל־ <WH5921> because בְּנֹתָ֑יו <WH1323> and for his daughters וַיִּתְחַזֵּ֣ק <WH2388> encouraged דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> but David בַּיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> himself in the LORD אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> his God ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶבְיָתָ֤ר <WH54> to Abiathar הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> the priest בֶּן־ <WH1121> son אֲחִימֶ֔לֶךְ <WH288> Ahimelech's הַגִּֽישָׁה־ <WH5066> I pray thee bring me hither נָּ֥א <WH4994> Please לִ֖י הָאֵפֹ֑ד <WH646> the ephod וַיַּגֵּ֧שׁ <WH5066> brought אֶבְיָתָ֛ר <WH54> And Abiathar אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֵפֹ֖ד <WH646> thither the ephod אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִֽד׃ <WH1732> to David

וַיִּשְׁאַ֨ל <WH7592> enquired דָּוִ֤ד <WH1732> And David בַּֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> at the LORD לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying אֶרְדֹּ֛ף <WH7291> Shall I pursue אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after הַגְּדוּד־ <WH1416> army הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this הַֽאַשִּׂגֶ֑נּוּ <WH5381> for thou shalt surely וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> them? And he answered לוֹ֙ רְדֹ֔ף <WH7291> him Pursue כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הַשֵּׂ֥ג <WH5381> overtake תַּשִּׂ֖יג <WH5381> overtake וְהַצֵּ֥ל <WH5337> [them] and without fail תַּצִּֽיל׃ <WH5337> recover

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> So David ה֚וּא <WH1931> he וְשֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> he and the six מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred אִישׁ֙ <WH376> men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> for וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> that [were] with him and came עַד־ <WH5704> against נַ֣חַל <WH5158> to the brook הַבְּשׂ֑וֹר <WH1308> Besor וְהַנּֽוֹתָרִ֖ים <WH3498> where those that were left behind עָמָֽדוּ׃ <WH5975> stayed

וַיִּרְדֹּ֣ף <WH7291> pursued דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> But David ה֖וּא <WH1931> he וְאַרְבַּע־ <WH702> he and four מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> men וַיַּֽעַמְדוּ֙ <WH5975> abode behind מָאתַ֣יִם <WH3967> for two hundred אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who פִּגְּר֔וּ <WH6296> which were so faint מֵעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> that they could not go over אֶת־ <WH853> נַ֥חַל <WH5158> the brook הַבְּשֽׂוֹר׃ <WH1308> Besor

וַֽיִּמְצְא֤וּ <WH4672> And they found אִישׁ־ <WH376> an מִצְרִי֙ <WH4713> Egyptian בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> in the field וַיִּקְח֥וּ <WH3947> and brought אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> him to David וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <WH5414> and gave ל֥וֹ לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> him bread וַיֹּ֔אכַל <WH398> and he did eat וַיַּשְׁקֻ֖הוּ <WH8248> and they made him drink מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> water

וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <WH5414> And they gave לוֹ֩ פֶ֨לַח <WH6400> him a piece דְּבֵלָ֜ה <WH1690> of a cake וּשְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> of figs and two צִמֻּקִים֙ <WH6778> clusters of raisins וַיֹּ֔אכַל <WH398> and when he had eaten וַתָּ֥שָׁב <WH7725> came again רוּח֖וֹ <WH7307> his spirit אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> about כִּ֠י <WH3588> for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> had not אָ֤כַל <WH398> to him for he had eaten לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> no bread וְלֹא־ <WH3808> or שָׁ֣תָה <WH8354> nor drunk מַ֔יִם <WH4325> [any] water שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> three יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> days וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> and three לֵילֽוֹת׃ <WH3915> nights ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said ל֤וֹ דָוִד֙ <WH1732> And David לְֽמִי־ <WH4310> to whom אַ֔תָּה <WH859> you וְאֵ֥י <WH335> and where מִזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> he אָ֑תָּה <WH859> and he וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <WH559> unto him To whom [belongest] thou? and whence [art] thou? And he said נַ֧עַר <WH5288> I [am] a young man מִצְרִ֣י <WH4713> of Egypt אָנֹ֗כִי <WH595> I עֶ֚בֶד <WH5650> servant לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> of an עֲמָֽלֵקִ֔י <WH6003> Amalekite וַיַּעַזְבֵ֧נִי <WH5800> left אֲדֹנִ֛י <WH113> and my master כִּ֥י <WH3588> when חָלִ֖יתִי <WH2470> agone I fell sick הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> days שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> me because three

אֲנַ֡חְנוּ <WH587> we פָּשַׁ֜טְנוּ <WH6584> We made an invasion נֶ֧גֶב <WH5045> [upon] the south הַכְּרֵתִ֛י <WH3774> of the Cherethites וְעַל־ <WH5921> that אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לִֽיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> and upon [the coast] which [belongeth] to Judah וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on נֶ֣גֶב <WH5045> and upon the south כָּלֵ֑ב <WH3612> of Caleb וְאֶת־ <WH853> צִקְלַ֖ג <WH6860> Ziklag שָׂרַ֥פְנוּ <WH8313> and we burned בָאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> with fire

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> then דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> And David הֲתוֹרִדֵ֖נִי <WH3381> to him Canst thou bring me down אֶל־ <WH413> about הַגְּד֣וּד <WH1416> to this company הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> to this וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <WH559> said הִשָּׁבְעָה֩ <WH7650> Swear לִּ֨י בֵֽאלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> unto me by God אִם־ <WH518> me nor תְּמִיתֵ֗נִי <WH4191> that thou wilt neither kill וְאִם־ <WH518> or תַּסְגִּרֵ֙נִי֙ <WH5462> deliver בְּיַד־ <WH3027> me into the hands אֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> of my master וְאוֹרִֽדְךָ֖ <WH3381> and I will bring thee down אֶל־ <WH413> about הַגְּד֥וּד <WH1416> band הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

וַיֹּ֣רִדֵ֔הוּ <WH3381> And when he had brought him down וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold נְטֻשִׁ֖ים <WH5203> behold [they were] spread abroad עַל־ <WH5921> over פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> upon all כָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the earth אֹכְלִ֤ים <WH398> eating וְשֹׁתִים֙ <WH8354> and drinking וְחֹ֣גְגִ֔ים <WH2287> and dancing בְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> of all הַשָּׁלָ֣ל <WH7998> spoil הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> because of all the great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> they לָקְח֛וּ <WH3947> that they had taken מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וּמֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> and out of the land יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וַיַּכֵּ֥ם <WH5221> smote דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> And David מֵהַנֶּ֥שֶׁף <WH5399> them from the twilight וְעַד־ <WH5704> until הָעֶ֖רֶב <WH6153> even unto the evening לְמָֽחֳרָתָ֑ם <WH4283> of the next day וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not נִמְלַ֤ט <WH4422> and there escaped מֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> and not אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> not a man כִּי֩ <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo אַרְבַּ֨ע <WH702> of them save four מֵא֧וֹת <WH3967> hundred אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> men נַ֛עַר <WH5288> young אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who רָכְב֥וּ <WH7392> which rode עַל־ <WH5921> on הַגְּמַלִּ֖ים <WH1581> upon camels וַיָּנֻֽסוּ׃ <WH5127> and fled

וַיַּצֵּ֣ל <WH5337> recovered דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> And David אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לָקְח֖וּ <WH3947> had carried away עֲמָלֵ֑ק <WH6002> all that the Amalekites וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> his two נָשָׁ֖יו <WH802> wives הִצִּ֥יל <WH5337> rescued דָּוִֽד׃ <WH1732> and David

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nothing נֶעְדַּר־ <WH5737> And there was nothing lacking לָ֠הֶם מִן־ <WH4480> to them neither הַקָּטֹ֨ן <WH6996> small וְעַד־ <WH5704> or הַגָּד֜וֹל <WH1419> nor great וְעַד־ <WH5704> or בָּנִ֤ים <WH1121> neither sons וּבָנוֹת֙ <WH1323> nor daughters וּמִשָּׁלָ֔ל <WH7998> neither spoil וְעַ֛ד <WH5704> or כָּל־ <WH3605> anything אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> they לָקְח֖וּ <WH3947> nor any [thing] that they had taken לָהֶ֑ם הַכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all הֵשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> recovered דָּוִֽד׃ <WH1732> to them David

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַצֹּ֖אן <WH6629> all the flocks וְהַבָּקָ֑ר <WH1241> and the herds נָהֲג֗וּ <WH5090> [which] they drave לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> before הַמִּקְנֶ֣ה <WH4735> [other] cattle הַה֔וּא <WH1931> those וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and said זֶ֖ה <WH2088> This שְׁלַ֥ל <WH7998> spoil דָּוִֽד׃ <WH1732> This [is] David's

וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> came דָוִ֗ד <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to מָאתַ֨יִם <WH3967> to the two hundred הָאֲנָשִׁ֜ים <WH376> men אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> who פִּגְּר֣וּ ׀ <WH6296> which were so faint מִלֶּ֣כֶת ׀ <WH1980> along אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after that דָוִ֗ד <WH1732> David וַיֹּֽשִׁיבֻם֙ <WH3427> whom they had made also to abide בְּנַ֣חַל <WH5158> at the brook הַבְּשׂ֔וֹר <WH1308> Besor וַיֵּֽצְאוּ֙ <WH3318> and they went forth לִקְרַ֣את <WH7122> to meet דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> David וְלִקְרַ֖את <WH7122> meet הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> for וַיִּגַּ֤שׁ <WH5066> came near דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> that [were] with him and when David אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> to the people וַיִּשְׁאַ֥ל <WH7592> ask counsel לָהֶ֖ם לְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> favor ס

וַיַּ֜עַן <WH6030> Then answered כָּל־ <WH3605> all אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> men רָ֣ע <WH7451> all the wicked וּבְלִיַּ֗עַל <WH1100> and [men] of Belial מֵֽהָאֲנָשִׁים֮ <WH376> save to every man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who הָלְכ֣וּ <WH1980> that went עִם־ <WH5973> with דָּוִד֒ <WH1732> with David וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> and said יַ֚עַן <WH3282> those אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not הָלְכ֣וּ <WH1980> Because they went עִמִּ֔י <WH5973> with לֹֽא־ <WH3808> we will not נִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> not with us we will not give לָהֶ֔ם מֵהַשָּׁלָ֖ל <WH7998> them [ought] of the spoil אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who הִצַּ֑לְנוּ <WH5337> that we have recovered כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> man אֶת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתּוֹ֙ <WH802> his wife וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> and his children וְיִנְהֲג֖וּ <WH5090> that they may lead [them] away וְיֵלֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> and depart ס
